source: 父母呼。应勿缓。
standard: When your mother or father is calling, Do not be slow to respond. When my parents call me, I will answer them right away.
answer: Parents call. Don't slow down.

source: 想吃鸡蛋就得忍受鸡叫
standard: he who wants to eat egg must endures the crackling hen .
answer: If you want to eat eggs, you have to put up with the chicken.

source: 席卷全球
standard: is sweeping way across the world
answer: ♪ All over the world ♪

source: 见与不见
standard: You meet me or not .
answer: See and disappear.

source: 青菜萝卜各有所爱
standard: every has his hobbyhorse
answer: The cabbage radish is in love with each other.

source: 若要梦想实现，先从梦中醒来
standard: If you want to make your dream come true, the first thing you have to do is to wake up.
answer: If you want your dreams to come true, wake up from your dreams.

source: 我要永远健康。
standard: God ,you must bless me always healthy.
answer: I want to be healthy forever.

source: 我们真的很投缘
standard: We  really  hit  it  off.
answer: We're so close.

source: 采得百花成蜜后，为谁辛苦为谁甜
standard: All day from all flowers you make much honey, those who plunder the fruit of your toil are happy.
answer: After all the flowers and honey, I'll work hard for him and sweet for him.

source: 当你不能再拥有的时候，唯一可以做的就是令自己不要忘记
standard: The  only  thing  you  can  do  when  you  no  longer  have  something  is  not  to  forget.
answer: When you can't have it anymore, the only thing you can do is make yourself remember.

source: 希望可以把人调成静音模式。
standard: I wish I could put people on mute.
answer: It is hoped that the human being can be turned into a silent mode.

source: 你的过去不重要，重要的是你的未来
standard: It is not where you come from that counts, it is where you are going..
answer: Your past doesn't matter. It's your future.

source: 坚信梦想能实现，并果断采取行动，奇迹便会发生
standard: I wait for miracles.When you have no doubt that your dream can come true and take action from that place, miracles happen
answer: A miracle happens when you believe in the realization of your dreams and act with determination.

source: 要实现梦想，最好先醒来。
standard: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
answer: It's better to wake up if you want to realize your dreams.

source: 懂得感激是高尚者的标志
standard: Gratitude  is  the  sign  of  noble  souls
answer: To be grateful is to be the symbol of the noble.

source: 在邻舍面前击掌作保，乃是无知的人。
standard: A man void of understanding strikes hands, and becomes collateral in the presence of his neighbor.
answer: High-handedness in the presence of a neighbour is an ignorant man.

source: 快乐的旅伴犹如妙曲
standard: A merry companion is a waggon in the way
answer: ♪ Happy travel companions are like a song ♪

source: 名人们穷其毕生之力追求成名，然后带起墨镜避人耳目。
standard: Precisely.A celebrity is a person who works hard all his life to become well known, then wears dark glasses to avoid being recognized.
answer: Famous people have spent their entire lives seeking to be famous, and then bring their sunglasses to the ears and eyes.

source: 你所做的，要交托耶和华，你所谋的，就必成立
standard: Commit your deeds to Yahweh, and your plans shall succeed.
answer: What you have done, you have to give to the Lord, and what you have plotted, it will be established.

source: 与其用泪水悔恨昨天，不如用汗水拼搏今天
standard: Better to struggle in sweat for today than to repent with tears for yesterday.
answer: Instead of the tears of yesterday's regret, we'd better fight with the sweat of the day.

source: 找一件事做他一辈子找一个人爱她一辈子
standard: Give your whole life to one man and one thing
answer: Find one thing to do and find someone to love her for the rest of his life.

source: 这个碗与餐馆需要的食物无关。
standard: This bowl is not being used to serve food where it is needed in the cafeteria.
answer: This bowl has nothing to do with the food that the restaurant needs.

source: 说的越少，意味越多。早安
standard: Say less and mean more
answer: The less you say, the more it means. Good morning.

source: 如果没有你，我在哪里又有什么可惜。
standard: What does it matter where I am if you are not with me.
answer: If it wasn't for you, there'd be no shame where I am.

source: 喜欢一个人是宿命
standard: liking someone is your fate
answer: It's destiny to like someone.

source: 义人得脱离患难，有恶人来代替他。
standard: A righteous person is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked takes his place.
answer: And the righteous shall be delivered from distress, and there shall be a substitute for him.

source: 好书正如良友，会让你受益终生。
standard: good book is the best of friend, the same today and forever.
answer: A good book, like a good friend, will benefit you for the rest of your life.

source: 纵使困难重重，也不丧失勇气。
standard: difficulties  occur  but  not  the   loss   of   courage.
answer: Even with all the difficulties, there is no loss of courage.

source: 对他人的成功一样欢欣鼓舞
standard: be just as enthusiastic about the success of others as you are about your own
answer: I'm as excited as the success of others.

source: 在某个不经意的瞬间，才发现，原来，我一直都只是一个人。
standard: i have just one person.In a casual moment, only to find that, in fact, I have just one person.
answer: It was only at some unexpected moment that I discovered that I was always just a human being.

source: 今天不走，明天要跑。
standard: Today does not walk, will have to run tomorrow.
answer: I'm not leaving today. I'm running tomorrow.
